product_name: The North Face STH Soft-Shell Pants - Women's Long Sizes
long_description: Streamlined and stylish, and with a long inseam, The North Face STH women's soft-shell pants offer near-waterproof weather protection and 4-way stretch for comfort as you carve down the mountain. TNF(TM) Apex ClimateBlock soft-shell fabric is windproof and highly water-resistant; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Soft fleece lining wicks moisture and traps heat for comfort. Chimney Venting(TM) design uses StretchVent(TM) gaiters and zippered thigh vents with mesh gussets to vent moist air to keep you comfortable. Pants have a long inseam length with an active, streamlined fit; 4-way stretch ensures great freedom of movement. Rip-and-stick tabs on waistband adjust the fit; zippered, snap-closure fly; zip-close handwarmer pockets. The North Face STH soft-shell pants feature reinforced cuffs that resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis.
short_description: Streamlined and stylish, and with a long inseam, The North Face STH women's soft-shell pants offer near-waterproof weather protection and 4-way stretch for comfort as you carve down the mountain.
